additionalInfo.description: Display text providing more information on this eligibility constraint. Whether mandatory or not is dependent on the value of [discountEligibilityType](#tocSproductdiscounteligibilitydoc)

additionalInfoUri.description: Link to a web page with more information on this eligibility constraint

additionalValue.description: Generic field containing additional information relevant to the [discountEligibilityType](#tocSproductdiscounteligibilitydoc) specified. Whether mandatory or not is dependent on the value of [discountEligibilityType](#tocSproductdiscounteligibilitydoc)

discountEligibilityType.description: The type of the specific eligibility constraint for a discount
